EmailTemplate.description: Refi and/or HS Case Closure Template
EmailTemplate.name: Case Closure
EmailTemplate.subject: Lease#{!LeasePayment__c.Lease__c} - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good day!
This is {!Case.OwnerFullName} from Financing Support team. In reference to case #{!Case.CaseNumber}, we have completed the required support to move forward with your refinancing/lease assignment (choose what is applicable)
To summarize, we have provided the following documents to you and to your escrow company (select docs sent):
• Termination of UCC fixture filing which will be refiled 60 days from date of termination • Subordination of the Extinguishment of Notice of Independent Solar Energy Producer Contract • Submission of Escrow Instruction and Lease Assignment documents
Please let us know if I resolved your concern to your satisfaction. I will be closing the ticket I have created for you. If you feel that we have not resolved your concern, please feel free to reach us.
We're constantly striving to provide excellent service. You will be receiving a brief customer survey in your email, and I'd appreciate if you could take time to answer and let us know how you think I've been of service to you.
If you have other cases with SunPower, you will have a chance to rate us for each of these separately.
Thank you very much!
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Financing Support Team
